code: import{createStore,combineReducers,applyMiddleware}from"redux";import worksReducer from"./WorksReducer";import articlesReducer from"./ArticlesReducer";import{reducer as formReducer}from"redux-form";import AdminReducer from"./AdminReducer";import thunkMiddleWare from"redux-thunk";import FeedbackReducer from"./FeedbackReducer";var reducers=combineReducers({works:worksReducer,articles:articlesReducer,admin:AdminReducer,feedback:FeedbackReducer,form:formReducer});var store=createStore(reducers,applyMiddleware(thunkMiddleWare));window.store=store;export default store;
